Package org.lwjgl.ovr

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OVRLogCallback.SAM
    A functional interface for OVRLogCallback.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OVR
    Native bindings to libOVR, using the Oculus SDK C API.
    OVRErrorCode
    LibOVR error code declarations.
    OVRErrorInfo
    Provides information about the last error.
    OVREyeRenderDesc
    Rendering information for each eye.
    OVRFovPort
    Field Of View (FOV) in tangent of the angle units.
    OVRFrameTiming
    Frame timing data reported by OVR.ovrHmd_GetFrameTiming(long, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer).
    OVRGL
    Native bindings to libOVR, using the Oculus SDK C API.
    OVRGLTexture
    Contains OpenGL-specific texture information.
    OVRGLTextureData
    OpenGL texture data.
    OVRHmdDesc
    A complete descriptor of the HMD.
    OVRInitParams
    Parameters for OVR.ovr_Initialize(java.nio.ByteBuffer).
    OVRKeys
    Keys for libOVR's CAPI calls.
    OVRLayer_Union
    Union that combines ovrLayer types in a way that allows them to be used in a polymorphic way.
    OVRLayerDirect
    Describes a layer which is copied to the HMD as-is.
    OVRLayerEyeFov
    Describes a layer that specifies a monoscopic or stereoscopic view.
    OVRLayerEyeFovDepth
    Describes a layer that specifies a monoscopic or stereoscopic view, with depth textures in addition to color textures.
    OVRLayerHeader
    Defines properties shared by all ovrLayer structs, such as OVRLayerEyeFov.
    OVRLayerQuad
    Describes a layer of Quad type, which is a single quad in world or viewer space.
    OVRLogCallback
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the LogCallback member of the OVRInitParams struct.
    OVRMatrix4f
    A 4x4 matrix with float components.
    OVRPosef
    Position and orientation together.
    OVRPoseStatef
    A full pose (rigid body) configuration with first and second derivatives.
    OVRQuatf
    A quaternion rotation.
    OVRRecti
    A 2D rectangle with a position and size.
    OVRSensorData
    Specifies a reading we can query from the sensor.
    OVRSizei
    A 2D size with integer components.
    OVRSwapTextureSet
    Describes a set of textures that act as a rendered flip chain.
    OVRTexture
    Contains platform-specific information about a texture.
    OVRTextureHeader
    API-independent part of a texture descriptor.
    OVRTimewarpProjectionDesc
    Projection information for OVRLayerEyeFovDepth.
    OVRTrackingState
    Tracking state at a given absolute time (describes predicted HMD pose etc).
    OVRUtil
    Native bindings to the libOVR utility functions.
    OVRVector2f
    A 2D vector with float components.
    OVRVector2i
    A 2D vector with integer components.
    OVRVector3f
    A 3D vector with float components.
    OVRVersion
    LibOVR version identification.
    OVRViewScaleDesc
    Contains the data necessary to properly calculate position info for various layer types.
